Name: System Escape
About the game: Can you escape before the facility self-destructs? Robots, cameras and turrets will try and stop you. Be quiet, they have very good hearing! Hide, sneak and use abilities like invisibility and EMP blasts to get out alive. Equip a chargeable laser gun , inspired by Another World, to sneak attack, place shields and blast fortifications. Find loot and hackable computers to extend the self-destruction timer and unlock each floor. Procedurally generated floors allow for endless replayability. 3 difficulty levels , none are easy! Can you get all 3 trophies? Made for VR but supports non-VR. Vulkan-compatible graphics card required.
